Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
This class represents an Account Database that manages accounts. It includes functionalities to add, remove, and search the database.
Author:
George Seriani

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountDatabase()
    Constructor to initialize the accounts array with the fixed capacity length, the size to 0, and the archive as a new archive object

  • Method Details

    • lookUp

      public int lookUp(Profile profile, AccountType accountType)
      Check if the Holder already has a account of the type they are trying to open
      Parameters:
      profile - the Holders information
      accountType - The account type
      Returns:
      the index of their account if it exits, and NOT_FOUND otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Check if an account exits in the system
      Parameters:
      account - the account we are looking for
      Returns:
      true if found, false otherwise

    • add

      public boolean add(Account account)
      Add an account to the database, only if it doesn't already exist in the account
      Parameters:
      account - the account we would like to add

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Account account)
      Remove an account if it exists in the database, and add to the archive
      Parameters:
      account - the account we want to remove

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(AccountNumber number, double amount)
      Find the account that would like to withdraw money and call the withdrawal method created in Account()
      Parameters:
      number - the account number of the account that would like to withdraw
      amount - the amount the user would like to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • deposit

      public void deposit(AccountNumber number, double amount)
      Find the account that would like to deposit money and call the deposit method created in Account()
      Parameters:
      number - the account number of the account that would like to deposit
      amount - the amount the user would like to deposit
